body.p:
Princeton Ky June 16th 1861
Governor Magoffin
Dr sir

Enclosed please find 2 Petitions for your consideration on which I hope you may act to the pleasure of the parties or the Emergency of the times seem to require some relief and our political troubles the freedom of Every body capable & willing of doing to do the country any service Enclose you the letter of our Judge, the parties are poor and would have to suffer penalties that seem hard
